fields.name: AccessedAt
fields.description: Last time the message was sent, or a request was received, for this topic.

fields.name: AutoDeleteOnIdle
fields.description: ISO 8601 timespan idle interval after which the topic is automatically deleted. The minimum duration is 5 minutes.

fields.name: CreatedAt
fields.description: Exact time the message was created.

fields.name: DefaultMessageTimeToLive
fields.description: ISO 8601 Default message timespan to live value. This is the duration after which the message expires, starting from when the message is sent to Service Bus. This is the default value used when TimeToLive is not set on a message itself.

fields.name: DuplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow
fields.description: ISO8601 timespan structure that defines the duration of the duplicate detection history. The default value is 10 minutes.

fields.name: EnableBatchedOperations
fields.description: Value that indicates whether server-side batched operations are enabled.

fields.name: EnableExpress
fields.description: Value that indicates whether Express Entities are enabled. An express topic holds a message in memory temporarily before writing it to persistent storage.

fields.name: EnablePartitioning
fields.description: Value that indicates whether the topic to be partitioned across multiple message brokers is enabled.

fields.name: MaxMessageSizeInKilobytes
fields.description: Maximum size (in KB) of the message payload that can be accepted by the topic. This property is only used in Premium today and default is 1024.

fields.name: MaxSizeInMegabytes
fields.description: Maximum size of the topic in megabytes, which is the size of the memory allocated for the topic. Default is 1024.

fields.name: RequiresDuplicateDetection
fields.description: Value indicating if this topic requires duplicate detection.

fields.name: SizeInBytes
fields.description: Size of the topic, in bytes.

fields.name: SupportOrdering
fields.description: Value that indicates whether the topic supports ordering.

fields.name: UpdatedAt
fields.description: The exact time the message was updated.
